metadata.title: Famly - Your Family's Digital Home
metadata.description: Privacy-first family organization platform. Self-hosted or cloud. End-to-end encrypted messaging, shared calendars, and more.

hero.subheading: Keep your family connected, organized, and secure. Your data stays yours—forever.

features.title: Everything Your Family Needs
features.description: From daily tasks to cherished memories, Famly brings all aspects of family life together in one secure platform.

personalDiary.title: Personal Diary
personalDiary.description: Capture your thoughts and memories in a private, secure space.

familyMessaging.title: Family Messaging
familyMessaging.description: Stay connected with secure, private messaging for your family.

locationSharing.title: Location Sharing
locationSharing.description: Know where your loved ones are with optional real-time location sharing.

tasksAndChores.title: Tasks & Chores
tasksAndChores.description: Organize household responsibilities and track completion.

sharedMemories.title: Shared Memories
sharedMemories.description: Create a family timeline of photos, videos, and special moments.

shoppingLists.title: Shopping Lists
shoppingLists.description: Collaborative shopping lists that sync across all family members.

recipeManagement.title: Recipe Management
recipeManagement.description: Store and share your favorite family recipes in one place.

allowanceRewards.title: Allowance & Rewards
allowanceRewards.description: Manage allowances and reward systems for completed tasks.

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Optional AI features to help with meal planning, scheduling, and more.

smartHomeIntegration.title: Smart Home Integration
smartHomeIntegration.description: Connect with Home Assistant and other home management platforms.

highlight.title: Built for Modern Families
highlight.description: Whether you're coordinating schedules, sharing grocery lists, or preserving precious memories, Famly adapts to your family's unique needs.

privacy.title: Privacy Isn't Optional
privacy.description: In a world where your data is constantly harvested, we take a different approach. Your family's privacy is our top priority—not an afterthought.

yourDataYourControl.title: Your Data, Your Control
yourDataYourControl.description: We never sell, share, or use your data for advertising. Your family information belongs to you alone.

endToEndEncryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEndEncryption.description: All sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest, ensuring maximum security.

selfHostingFreedom.title: Self-Hosting Freedom
selfHostingFreedom.description: Host Famly on your own infrastructure with our easy Docker setup. Complete control, zero compromises.

zeroTracking.title: Zero Tracking
zeroTracking.description: No analytics, no tracking pixels, no third-party scripts. We respect your privacy completely.

dataPortability.title: Data Portability
dataPortability.description: Export your data anytime in standard formats. No lock-in, no barriers to leaving.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Our code is open for inspection. Verify our security claims and contribute to the project.

promise.title: Our Privacy Promise
promise.description: We will never sell your data. We will never use it for advertising. We will never share it with third parties. Your family's information is sacred, and we treat it that way. This isn't just a policy—it's our core principle.

pricing.title: Choose Your Path
pricing.description: Whether you prefer complete control or hassle-free convenience, we've got you covered.

selfHosted.title: Self-Hosted
selfHosted.disclaimer: Requires your own server or NAS

cloud.title: Cloud Hosted
cloud.disclaimer: 14-day free trial • No credit card required

featureNote.title: Same Features, Different Hosting
featureNote.description: Both options include all Famly features. The only difference is who manages the infrastructure. Self-hosting gives you complete control, while cloud hosting offers convenience. You can even start with cloud and migrate to self-hosted later!

footer.tagline: Privacy-first family management. Your data stays yours—forever.
